channel.title: CVE Feed for Magarsus Consultancy -- SSO (Single Sign On)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Magarsus Consultancy -- SSO (Single Sign On)

item.title: CVE-2024-4228|2024-06-26T14:28:24.028Z -- magarsus%20consultancy -- sso%20%28single%20sign%20on%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection'), CWE - 200 - Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor, CWE - 522 - Insufficiently Protected Credentials vulnerability in Magarsus Consultancy SSO (Single Sign On) allows SQL Injection.This issue affects SSO (Single Sign On): from 1.0 before 1.1.
